HP:
Whilst I worked at HP I led a small team of designers working on a project aimed at small to medium business. We managed 32 countries in 18 different langauges, including the ever so complicated ones like hebrew and arabic.

We worked to provide support the sales teams and via the HP SMB parter portal, updating and creating content such as banners and in depth information for product launches

Whilst in the role, I worked with my team to streamline processes and simplify workflow, as at times the corporate structure can be a little bloated. ;)
TBOE:
Ah, The Book of Everyone. A small UK startup creating personalised products. My role at TBOE was varied,  taking in all aspects of marketing and project management.

I worked on numerous campaigns for the company including the Cannes Lion shortlisted '3 Pregnant Dads, which you can leanr more about: http://bhs.butterhalfsix.com/bhs/3-pregnant-dads/, and also marketing a christmas viral shareable personal snowflake, that recieved over 1 million page views over a two week period leading up to christmas.
